How can I view a specific transaction on the Verus network?

You can view a specific transaction on the Verus network using the `z_viewtransaction` command, followed by the transaction ID. Here's an example:

```
verus z_viewtransaction "1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d"
```

Alternatively, you can use the Verus RPC API to achieve the same result. For example, using `curl`:

```
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "z_viewtransaction", "params": ["1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```

Examples:
> verus z_viewtransaction "1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d"
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "z_viewtransaction", "params": ["1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
